text:
I’m a SHERPAPA! For those of you wondering, A sherpapa is a strong family leader, guide, and protector of our children’s future. It is also a term of endearment for a beloved father or grandfather. It is a combination of the words sherpa (expert guide or mentor) and papa (universal term for father), but also a reference to cher papa, which in French means “dearest papa”. I think this is a great word for describing the modern family man, in a time when great leadership and examples are more important than ever. Our company’s mission is to support and celebrate a new generation of family leaders. @sherpapa_life #happyhalloween

A post shared by Matthew Morrison (@_matthew.morrison_) on Oct 29, 2017 at 9:28am PDT
title: Matthew Morrison Gushes Over Fatherhood: "It's Just a Beautiful Transformation in My Life"

og.title: Matthew Morrison Gushes Over Fatherhood: "It's Just a Beautiful Transformation in My Life"
